name: Rackner
description:
Rackner is a Digital Transformation Consultancy and Certified AWS Partner that builds innovative solutions for enterprises and startups.
We work on cloud-native and hybrid-cloud application development, enterprise mobility, mobile app development, and cutting-edge cloud architecture - including serverless, container orchestration, and microservices.
You can get in touch with us at rackner.com/contact
 
Core Competencies
- Cloud Architecture
- Enterprise Software, SaaS
- Serverless and Microservices
- Cloud-Native and Hybrid-Cloud development
- Web and Mobile Applications Development
- DevSecOps & Automation
